algorithm_technique: Precomputed prefix sums of days in months, handling leap years.
Iterative summation of days in months, checking for leap years on the fly.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the day number of the year for a given date string.
problem_summary_technical: Parses date string, sums days of preceding months, adds day of month, and accounts for leap years.
key_insights: Pre-calculating the cumulative days in months (prefix sums) optimizes repeated calculations.
Leap year logic must be correctly implemented: divisible by 4, but not by 100 unless also by 400.
The problem can be solved either by precomputation or by direct iteration through months.
